[b][color=#ffffff]Post Editing Updates & Limits[/color][/b]
With the recent post editing limitations, a finalized list of post restrictions has been implemented. 

The post limits can be found by visiting the [url=https://hackforums.net/misc.php?action=help]Help Documents [/url]or by following this link: https://hackforums.net/misc.php?action=help&hid=41
[spoiler][img]https://cybercustom.com/uploads/images/x0oxcr.png[/img][/spoiler]

**Stickies (paid or free) have unlimited edits.

[size=xx-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5808840&pid=56966503#pid56966503]>>see post[/url][/size]

[hr]

[b][color=#ffffff]Old Wounds Finally Sealed, Massive Bot Closures[/color][/b]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999F1]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] has released a detailed description of his recent updates to Hack Forums in regards to unused, closed accounts dating back to 2011 in which a portion of an old database were dumped. Completely ineffective, the dump was rendered useless shortly after its release; with strict password policy changes being implemented immediately after as an extra precaution.

[quote='Omniscient']
April 12th, 2018 we had about 30,000 bot login attempts to these accounts.  This means those accounts the passwords were compromised.  But here is the good part.  My logs gave me everything I needed to track down all the stolen accounts and permanently close all of them. So thanks to whoever spent their time with this and helped me finally close them all. 
[/quote]

An old thread regarding the dump can be found here: https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1414679

[size=xx-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5825504]>>see thread[/url][/size]


[hr]

[b][color=#ffffff]Hello, Hola and Hallå![/color][/b]
A new, or not-so-new, subforum has been added to Hack Forums recently encouraging members from all over the world to participate in several international sections. Some of the different sections include languages such as:
[list]
[*]Chinese - 中文
[*]Spanish - Español
[*]Indian - हिंदी
[*]Scandinavian - Skandinavisk
[*]and more..
[/list]

You can access the International subforum by clicking the World Tab:
[img]https://cybercustom.com/uploads/images/k201s4.png[/img]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3322334][img]https://i.imgur.com/H5MRIbN.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Tax on Sugary Beverages Curbs Consumption[/color][/b] 
Residents of Pennsylvania have been drinking much healthier as of late. A tax of $0.015/ounce on sugar and sugar-substitute beverages was levied in the state on January 1, 2017. The tax may not sound like much on paper, but it caused the price of the average can of sugary beverage to jump up twenty percent. According to a study conducted earlier this year by surveying nine hundred residents, the consumption of these beverages has fallen an astounding fifty-eight percent. However, strangely enough, the sales of drinks with added sugar such as lemonade stayed constant.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.inquisitr.com/4865808/soda-tax-impact-philadelphia-residents-40-percent-less-likely-to-drink-sugary-soda-each-day-after-new-tax/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Leaving at the Door may Improve Happiness[/color][/b] 
An interesting study was recently conducted into the effects of technology on human behavior. More specifically, they tested the impact of not bringing a cell phone into the bedroom at all. Their study found that leaving the phone out improved the overall quality of life of their subjects, as well as decreased the odds of an addiction to the phone forming. Subjects also reported feeling far more rested during the study. At the end of the study, the subjects were asked if they planned on continuing this practice and 93.6% of the participants said they would. Certainly some interesting food for thought. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0747563218301523]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/lv4d7BY.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]United States and United Kingdom Launch Strikes on Syria[/color][/b] 
During the evening of 13 April, President Trump had confirmed that ‘precision strikes’ were en route to targets that have an association with Syria’s governmental chemical weapons program. On the nationally televised address, Trump stated that he ‘ordered the United States Armed Forces to launch precision strikes on targets associated with the chemical weapons capabilities of Syrian director Bashar al Assad.’ Later, in his statement, he goes on to say that this was a joint operation that was aided by the armed forces of the United Kingdom and France. During a submission of her own, UK Prime Minister Theresa May had confirmed that she ordered “British armed forces to conduct ‘co-ordinated and targeted strikes to degrade the Syrian regime’s chemical weapons capability and deter their use.’ As a result, this marks history for the United Kingdom Prime Minister, seeing as she was the first of her role to order such tasks. The missiles launched were RAF Tornado GR4s, which were directed towards a military facility “15 miles west of Homs.” The purpose of this launch was to degrade Assad’s chemical weapons capability.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://news.sky.com/story/us-uk-launch-military-strikes-on-syria-11329796]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Trinidad and Tobago to Decriminalize Homosexuality[/color][/b] 
After a lengthy civil right fight in the country of Trinidad and island of Tobago, the two are set to decriminalize homosexuality. On 12 April, a ‘high court judge rules Thursday that the Caribbean nation’s colonial-era law banning gay sex is unconstitutional.” Sections 13 and 16 of the Sexual Offenses Act were deemed “unconstitutional, illegal, null void, invalid and of no effect to the extent that these laws criminalize any acts constituting consensual sexual conduct between adults,’ Justice Devindra Rampersad provided in his notion. Before the ban, Section 13 of the Sexual Offenses Act declares one whom who engages in ‘buggery’ – an alternative term used to describe fornication of the anal – is subject to jail-time – up to 25 years. In Section 16, it states that if an individual were to commit an ‘act of serious indecency’ – which can be alternatively defined as masturbation – can face up to 5 years in prison. Jason Jones, an LGBTQ activist who files the lawsuit in February 2017, is responsible for this. He is a native Trinidadian and claimed the two sections were in violation of the “freedom of expression” he and many others are promised.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.nbcnews.com/news/amp/ncna865511?__twitter_impression=true]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/uVQrGNh.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]PUBG War Mode Is Live, Adds Respawns[/color][/b]
A very short event, but it will allow fans to see if they are interested in this game mode being permanent. Until the end of this week, PUBG has introduced a brand new "war mode" that allows you to team up with other players in a deathmatch. Similiar to team deathmatch and other skirmish game modes in other games, you will be allowed to respawn after a given time of dying. It may seem like a good idea, but is it really? Try it out and see for yourself. At the time of release, it is only 10 vs. 10 as opposed to Fortnite's version which is 50 vs. 50. With the big map that PUBG has, is that too little of a team? Anyways, if you were to die, you have the chance to respawn by flying out of a plane like you do at the start of the battle royal game mode. That can be a nuisance for some. Would you rather spawn from the plane every 40 seconds or start boots on the ground? Share your thoughts on the news thread! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/pubg-war-mode-is-live-adds-respawns/1100-6458237/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Pokemon Go: Kanto Week Event Going on Now for a Limited Time[/color][/b]
Come celebrate Pokemon's "Kanto Week" by having the increased chance of having Pokemon from the Kanto region spawn! For the next few days, you will have this chance to catch any Pokemon you may need for candies or even the Pokedex. Generation I Pokemon will not only spawn more frequently, but the experience points for capturing them will also be increased for a limited time. Bulbasaur, Charmander, and Squirtle are just three examples of what you can find in the wild this week! If you have duplicates of said Pokemon, you will have the chance to transfer them to the lab for bonus candy too. Definitely needed to assist you in evolving your 'mons. Also, do not forget to participate in the next Community Day where eggs will have increased chances of hatching. The special Pokemon for this day will be Mareep. It will have an increased rate of spawning, and you will get the chance to unlock an exclusive event move when evolving it into Ampharos. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/pokemon-go-kanto-week-event-going-on-now-for-a-lim/1100-6458119/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Radical Heights: Female Characters Are "Coming Soon"[/color][/b]
If you have not seen already, there is a brand new battle-royal game on the Steam marketplace. The game is called, "Radical Heights" and is a free-to-play BR game that takes place in an urban and suburban environment. So far the game does not have that many great reviews and a lot of bugs have been reported. Those who have tested and played the game state that it was released too early. It is still in early access so we just need to give it some time. During the currently early release, there was no introduction of female playable characters. That will be changing soon as the developers, LawBreakers, plan on introducing female characters soon. More new things to come will be new weapons and vehicles to hopefully make the playing experience more fun. What makes this different than popular BR games like Fortnite and PUBG is the money system in place. Instead of a point system or experience system, you earn money for the actions that you do. Things from killing people, winning games, and much more. In addition, instead of cars or gliders, you get to ride a BMX bike. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/radical-heights-female-characters-are-coming-soon/1100-6458142/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/q2F6BnS.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]My Hero Academia and Avengers Team up for a Super Promotion![/color][/b]
Famous Super Heroes from the west usually collaborate often. For example, even though they were on a different side Batman vs. Superman was a movie where the two superheroes clashed. In addition, there were movies like Spiderman Homecoming where Peter Parker worked together with Tony Stark to create an ultimate team of Spiderman and Iron Man. Now, a cool collaboration of the Japanese anime My Hero Academia will be teaming up with the west to have a collaboration of My Hero Academia x The Avengers. Mini trailers have been made where the characters from My Hero Academia introduce you to the Western superheroes. Deku will be introducing you to Captain America, Uraraka tells the tale of the beautiful Black Widow, and Bakugo will showcase Iron Man. Other heroes were also introduced too. The third season of My Hero Academia started not too long ago on April 7. The new Avengers movie will be in theatres April 27. Due to the fact that both series take place in a world where superheroes risk their lives to help protect people all around the world, why not make a collab project? A few days prior to the release of The Avenger's new movie, there will be a special event all throughout different bookstores in Japan. Fans of the collaboration can purchase postcards and other merchandise for a limited time. This is some great news but to go even further, stay tuned the next few weeks as more and more information will be released on the new upcoming My Hero Academia movie! Also, make sure to check out the promotional collaboration videos [url=https://otakumode.com/news/5acf15efd3cf5a076db86a9a/My-Hero-Academia-and-Avengers-Team-Up-for-a-Super-Promotion!]here[/url]. They are actually pretty cool. [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5acf15efd3cf5a076db86a9a/My-Hero-Academia-and-Avengers-Team-Up-for-a-Super-Promotion!]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Which March Anime Birthdays Did Fans Celebrate the Most?[/color][/b]
Tsundere is probably the biggest idol fan on the forum. Additionally, Tsundere is also breaking the HFNT rules by writing about themselves. Let us hope that iHydra is not reading this article. Last month what was the most popular anime that was being celebrated? It just so happened to be Love Live! School Idol Project, one of Tsundere's favorite anime. A few birthdays took place this month for some of the characters of the Love Live series. These included Kunikida Hanamaru whos birthday was at the beginning of the month, March 4. Next, we had Sonoda Umi's birthday on March 15. The most memorable part of the month was probably towards the end when fans celebrated the second anniversary of the µ's Final Love Live concert. On March 31 and April 1, µ's held their final concert. It was a four hour, two-day long event and each day was sold out with over 100,000 fans attending in total. If you still have not seen the Love Live series watch it now!! [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5acc69e06259ee8b1dd45efd/Which-March-Anime-Birthdays-Did-Fans-Celebrate-the-Most]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]"OneRoom VR" Smart Phone App Releases New Key Visual[/color][/b]
Loli fans, prepare to get the lube... We mean the VR systems out! While we are still waiting for the second season of OneRoom to be completed, we can rest our minds and enjoy some time with beautiful girls in a VR-Spin-off application. Just do not get caught by your parents playing this game. The second season will be releasing sometime this year and to celebrate a VR application that was created with the help of funds by a crowd-funding project that took place last year will be releasing the VR application for iOS and Android. You'll have the chance to interact with Yui Hanasaka. Do not worry, we understand you will be watching out for the cops after a one hour session, but we will not snitch on you. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.crunchyroll.com/anime-news/2018/04/13/oneroom-vr-smart-phone-app-releases-new-key-visual]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Japan Is Getting Two Cowboy Bebop Cafes[/color][/b]
Two new cafes inspired by the anime Cowboy Bebop will be open for a limited time in Japan. Opening next month on May 15, the two cafes will have menus inspired by the anime and manga that was released originally in 1997 to 1998. The series is still popular among anime fans, whether you are just getting into it or a current veteran. At the time, there is no information on what will be in the cafe. Will it be a maid theme? Normal cafe to enjoy some coffee with the boys? We will have to wait and see! The cafe plans to run until June 10, so if you plan on visiting Japan or are currently there now, set your calendars for any time between May 15 and June 10! [i][size=x-small][url=https://kotaku.com/japan-getting-two-cowboy-bebop-cafes-1825200828]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]
posts.subject: RE: Hack Forums News // Edition 387
